html:
The Deluxe Illustrated version of The Lord of the Rings is the best way to enjoy J.R.R Tolkien's work in all its glory. It's one single volume containing the entirety of the LotR books as well as full-color illustrations from Tolkien himself. It's an enormous tome that also comes with two fold-out maps that reveal more detail of Middle Earth. It's also normally priced at a whopping $250 if it isn't discounted.

Thankfully, Amazon has dropped its first big sale on this Lord of the Rings book. With a 57% discount, you can currently pick up this collector's edition for $107. This is the lowest the price has dropped on this illustrated book since last summer.

The Best Lord of the Rings Illustrated Edition Deal at Amazon

The Lord of the Rings Deluxe Illustrated Edition

Includes illustrations from Tolkien himself.

This isn't the lowest price we've ever seen for the deluxe illustrated edition of Tolkien's work, but it comes pretty close. With the discount, you can pick it up for $107.55, which is only about a dollar off the lowest price we've ever seen for this book. So if you've been hoping to pick up this great LotR gift for yourself or a loved one, now is a great time to do so.

While this special edition includes all of the books from The Lord of the Rings trilogy, it doesn't include all of Tolkien's works. There are also deluxe illustrated editions of The Hobbit and Similarillon available. There's also a more affordable set of illustrated books you can buy that feature a different design and details.

What Comes With the Deluxe Special Edition

The special edition of The Lord of the Rings: Illustrated Edition is a single-volume hardbound book that comes in an eye-catching, intricately etched slipcase. It features a striking red-and-black design that’s meant to evoke the novel's first edition. The book itself is 1,248 pages, and includes the entire fantasy epic and appendices. The text is “corrected and reset,” and printed in red and black ink. Interspersed throughout this massive tome tome are 30 illustrations hand-drawn by Tolkien himself. These include maps, color illustrations, and sketches. Also included in the package are two fold-out maps of Middle-earth drawn by Christopher Tolkien.
